title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception and plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

title: Titanic
description: A romantic drama set against the backdrop of the tragic sinking of the Titanic.

title: Forrest Gump
description: A slow-witted but kind-hearted man witnesses and unwittingly influences historical events in the 20th century.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: The story of John Nash, a brilliant mathematician who battles schizophrenia.

title: Birdman
description: An actor famous for portraying a superhero tries to reclaim his career with a Broadway play.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Interstellar
description: Astronauts travel through a wormhole to save humanity.

title: Pride and Prejudice
description: A classic tale of love and misunderstandings in 19th-century England.

title: Superbad
description: Two high school friends try to party before graduation.

title: El increíble castillo vagabundo
description: After a witch transforms her into an old woman, a hat maker seeks refuge in the traveling home of a unique magician.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrant.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the shocking truth about his reality and joins a rebellion against machines enslaving humanity.

title: Back to the Future
description: A teenager accidentally travels back in time and must ensure his parents fall in love to save his future.

title: The Exorcist
description: A young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, and her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description: Teenagers are stalked by a vengeful spirit who kills them in their dreams.

title: El olvido que seremos
description: The story of the father of a Colombian writer. His father was a university professor who promoted tolerance and human rights in his country.

title: Nuestro Planeta
description: The natural beauty of the planet and how climate change affects all living things, from the remote Arctic desert to the jungles of South America.

title: Monos
description: In an isolated mountainous area, eight armed teenage guerrillas hold an American engineer and a dairy cow captive.
